meanings.sent1: She braggiest about her grades in school.
meanings.sent2: He always braggiest about his new car.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned to braggiest its new trick to impress visitors.
meanings.sent4: The river braggiest as it flowed swiftly through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The wind seemed to braggiest through the trees on a stormy night.

meanings.sent1: She is the braggiest person I know.
meanings.sent2: He wore the braggiest outfit to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a braggiest look after catching the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone in the braggiest manner, lighting up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood in the braggiest way against the sky.
